citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the Institutional Animal Care & Use Committee paperwork and contingency plan were not
available for review and examination by APHIS officials. The facility was asked to provide the paperwork but was unable
to do so in a timely manner.
Review of IACUC paperwork and other documents ensures that the IACUC is functioning as intended. Required records,
as outlined in the Animal Welfare Act and regulations, must be available for APHIS officials to review at the time of
inspection. The registrant must establish a system that ensures records are available upon inspection.
To be corrected by June 27, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant.
n

narrative:
2.38(b)(1)(ii) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
At the time of inspection, the Institutional Animal Care & Use Committee paperwork and contingency plan were not 
available for review and examination by APHIS officials. The facility was asked to provide the paperwork but was unable 
to do so in a timely manner. 
 
Review of IACUC paperwork and other documents ensures that the IACUC is functioning as intended. Required records, 
as outlined in the Animal Welfare Act and regulations, must be available for APHIS officials to review at the time of 
inspection. The registrant must establish a system that ensures records are available upon inspection. 
 
To be corrected by June 27, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant.
